title: LP loss for DC/Unable to buy rune pages
body:
Scored a kill on their support (well our adc did, i just popped alotta health and slowed), and then BAM, net outage. 
Something out of my control. 
What do when falsely labeled leaver (a common af issue might i add)?

LP loss I can deal with, we lost but still. There was no leaving, only DCing. 

Also, I can't buy rune pages, and I definitely have the essence for them.
